snippet: A bill proposing pay-at-the-pump auto insurance for the state was rejected by the Senate Judiciary Committee on Tuesday. The vote was 8 to 1, with only the bill's author, State Senator Art Torres, voting in favor....
lead_paragraph: A bill proposing pay-at-the-pump auto insurance for the state was rejected by the Senate Judiciary Committee on Tuesday. The vote was 8 to 1, with only the bill's author, State Senator Art Torres, voting in favor.

headline.main: California Lawmakers Reject 'Pay at the Pump' Insurance
